welcome_body.message:
Thanks for installing our free browser extension. Now you can activate our free proxy servers and browse the internet without boundaries.

The extension takes care of your privacy and prevents unwanted WebRTC leaks. The feature can be controlled in the settings.

Hide.me customers can enable a SOCKS proxy in the settings, which can be used in combination with an active VPN connection to prevent IP leaks.

privacy_modal_body.message: You can read on our website why you should disable WebRTC or QUIC. More information can be found here.

quick_enabled_message.message: Quic is enabled. To turn it off follow this link.

features_unblock_websites.message: Unblock websites - Speak out your mind and do lot more on the internet with hide.me VPN.

features_best_servers.message: Global network - Pick the location closest to you and browse without limits.

features_no_limit.message: Apps for all devices - We have apps for Windows, Android, iOS and macOS.

firefox_privacy.message: Due to latest Firefox changes to extension privacy settings you need to allow this extension to run in Private Mode in order for it to function.
